summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 3.8°C) and outside temperature (down 2.4°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 733 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1432 m), feels like temperature (up 5.7°C), outside temperature (up 4.0°C), and inside temperature (up 1.6°C) when compared to today.

Today’s average cloud levels is 732.7m lower than yesterday, 561.8m lower than the past week, 1431.9m lower than the past month.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 745m and a peak of 3580m, averaging 1253.8m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.
cloud levels.summary: The sky may alternate between sunny and overcast.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; moderate and mild. Also, pleasant humidity levels. Possible light showers, the sky may alternate between sunny and overcast, and the light is absent. Changeable conditions.
